OOC: I have to admit... Nice going with mutate!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> OOC: Did I say Ravage again I meant Rampage.
> 
> Rhesus detects a frequency, but doesn't know whose it is.  It seems 
> bizaar. He grabbs some energon cubes as peace offerings and goes to 
> see what it is.  He finds Transmutate crying.
> 
> Rhesus: What's wrong.
> 
> Transmutate: No friend.
> 
> Rhesus hands him the energon cubes and he eats them.
> 
> Transmutate: Friend.
> 
> Rhesus: Yes I'm a friend.
> 
> Rhesus guesses that Transmutates spark never fully went on line so 
he 
> begins slowly probing his knowledge a little at a time to bring him 
> out of it.
> 
> Rhesus: Do you have any other friends?
> 
> Mutate: Did.
> 
> Rhesus: Who?
> 
> Mutate: Sil-ver-bolt...Ram-page.
> 
> Rhesus: What happened to them?
> 
> Mutate: Don't know.
> 
> Rhesus: What factions were they in?
> 
> Mutate: Silver-bolt Maxi-mal...Rav-age Predi-con.
> 
> Rhesus: (jackpot) Did you have any more.
> 
> Mutate: They think I stupid.
> 
> Rhesus: Who said something like that?
> 
> Mutate: Rhi-nox, but he use different words.
> 
> Rhesus: (perfect now he's revising the words of others) Well I'm 
sure 
> he was wrong. What faction are you in.
> 
> Mutate: Well, I was a Maximal Protoform, but I don't approve of 
> fighting. In fact I jumped in the...hey....I'm not dumb anymore.
> 
> Rhesus: Nope. Just some gradually drilling into your spark. You need 
> new legs. Let's go.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Rhesus gets the first canon online, but still has to mount it.  He 
> > moves to the second one.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > OOC: In case from the craziness of my past posts you couldn't 
tell 
> > > Rhesus is sort of a Kung Fu guy who feels he lost his honor 
> (except 
> > > now it's because they abandoned and outpost).
> > > 
> > > Rhesus has the 2 thrusters/cannons down and is rummaging in the 
> > > shuttle for tools.  He picks up a small holograpic projector and 
> > looks 
> > > sadly at it.  He sits down and begins to meditate.  He turns on 
> the 
> > > projector. A picture of a girl bot comes up. The projector 
starts 
> > > playing a recording of a woman singing the "Outlaw Star" theme:
> > > 
> > > 
> > >                 I don't know
> > >                 what words I can say.
> > >                 The wind has a way
> > >                 to talk to me.
> > >                 Flowers sleep
> > >                 a silent lullaby.
> > >                 I pray for reply.
> > >                 I'm reeeeaaaaady.
> > >                 (I forget how the next verse goes and that's 
> > actually 
> > > a traslated version they sing twice in the series not the one 
they 
> > > sing at the end of each episode in Japanese).
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > >  During this Rhesus has flashbacks (hey I needed to introduce 
some 
> > > conflict).  A small out post with the girl, Mustex, Stallex is 
> born, 
> > > they constantly try with there few resorces to figure out why 
> > Stallex 
> > > has to constantly upgrade like organics to adulthood over the 
last 
> > 10 
> > > months (I just dicided to say he ages 12 times faster than human 
> > kids 
> > > although it will stop after 20 months and return to normal), 
then 
> an 
> > > attack, fighters are everywhere, they four of them are running 
to 
> > the 
> > > shuttle, 20 ft. away she's grabbed from behind, she's held 
around 
> > the 
> > > neck by a large shadowy bot he can't quite make out, she screams 
> at 
> > > him to go, he screams he won't but pushed the button to close 
the 
> > door 
> > > anyway like a coward, and the shuttle takes off.
> > > 
> > > He stands up crying. He stops still looking sad.  He gets his 
> tools 
> > > and gets back to work on the cannons.
